Company: FERRELLGAS INC - ELK GROVE SERVICE CENTER
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Description: Ferrellgas entered into a master agreement to change its business practices and agreed to pay the state $85,000 to settle allegations that the liquid propane company violated the Arkansas Deceptive Trade Practices Act by unilaterally modifying contracts with Arkansas consumers.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20101224171721/http://ag.arkansas.gov/newsroom/index.php?do:newsDetail=1&news_id=361

Description: Ferrellgas agreed to pay $25,000 costs in settlement of allegations its pricing and marketing of gas could be deceptive or confusing.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20111220163034/http://www.state.ia.us/government/ag/latest_news/releases/oct_2010/Ferrellgas.html

Description: Ferrellgas agreed to pay $100,000 in refunds in settlement of allegations it overcharged customers for propane gas and failed to deliver on time.
Info Source: https://wayback.archive-it.org/418/20160103051553/http://www.michigan.gov/ag/0,4534,7-164-46849_47203-337867--,00.html
https://ag.ny.gov/press-release/attorney-general-james-announces-settlement-fuel-supplier-caused-customers-lose-heat

Description: Ferrellgas agreed to pay $450,000 in restitution in settlement of allegations its propane gas pricing and fees were deceptive.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20110930053517/http://www.ag.state.mn.us/Consumer/PressRelease/110823FerrellGas.asp

Company: Ferrellgas Partners L.P. and Ferrellgas L.P.
Description: Blue Rhino (Ferrellgas) and AmeriGas agreed to pay $1 million and $0.8 million respectively in settlement of allegations by the District Attorneys of Alameda, Fresno, Monterey, San Joaquin, Santa Clara, Sonoma, and Ventura counties that they reduced the amount of propane sold in their barbeque propane cylinders while keeping the tanks locked in cages before purchase, stopping customers from noticing that the content had been reduced.
Info Source: https://www.alcoda.org/newsroom/2013/dec/das_office_reaches_18m_settlement

Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
NAICS Translation: 484230: Specialized Freight (except Used Goods) Trucking, Long-Distance
Info Source: February 7, 2020 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Info Source: https://www.epa.gov/newsreleases/epa-and-doj-reach-settlement-agreement-ferrellgas-inc-prevent-chemical-accidents
